summary: A lightweight multi‑layer perceptron that serves as the prediction head in the DETR object‑detection architecture, taking feature vectors and outputting normalized bounding‑box parameters (center x, center y, height, width) for each detected object.
business_intent: Enable accurate and efficient bounding‑box regression within an end‑to‑end object detection pipeline, supporting applications such as visual inspection, autonomous navigation, and image‑based analytics.
